text: Went to purchase a birthday cake. Annie, with her quick understanding, helped me decide. She is a valuable asset to the team, with exceptional customer service.

The CNY edition of the Original All Chocolate Cake was good. Itâ€™s moist, not too sweet and chocolatey. Loved the packaging, too. I picked up my order from the store and was served by a grumpy bespectacled male Chinese staff. If that was the store manager, perhaps the management should send him to attend a customer service course. Heâ€™s just not service-oriented, no smile, no thank you, just an unhappy employee attending to customers.

Super impressed with the service at Awfully Chocolate Tampines 1! The only staff on duty was so friendly and helpful, handling everything with a great attitude. She made the whole experience smooth and pleasant.
Someone gave us dark chocolate last time then I remebered the Dark Truffles chocolate of Awfully Chocolate. Went out to buy today. Cravings satisfied ðŸ˜„.

I was getting a small slice of cake for a friendâ€™s birthday. The lady at the counter is very nice and friendly and made recommendations per my criteria. The packaging is very beautiful too. Had a very warm and nice experience.
